title: What is the story behind the large yacht in dry dock on the far side of the Cape Fear River that you can see from 421 when driving north?  It has been there for years.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2011/01/what-can-you-tell-me-about-the-large-white-yacht-across-from-the-wilmington-convention-center/
